_notes: Retrieves a single branch by ID to poll for readiness after creation
Poll with 5-second delay, max 6 retries (30 seconds total)
Branch is ready when ready=true in the response
Called by Process C (step 3.8) after creating a promotion branch
If branch never becomes ready, error with BRANCH_CREATION_TIMEOUT and delete branch

_response_structure.name: string — branch name (e.g., promo-{promotionId})
_response_structure.ready: boolean — true when branch is ready for component writes
_response_structure.stage: string — branch lifecycle stage: CREATING (initial) or NORMAL (ready for operations)

_stage_notes: New branches start with stage=CREATING while Boomi provisions the branch
Stage transitions to NORMAL when ready=true — the branch is fully provisioned
For polling purposes, check ready=true rather than stage=NORMAL (ready is the documented gate)
